price: Nao hawakuona baya lolote kwao ila kuwa wakimuamini Mwenyezi Mungu, Mwenye nguvu, Msifiwa!
arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ
footnotes: Na hapana walilo lichukia kwa hao Waumini ila ni kuwa wakimuamini Mwenyezi Mungu Mwenye nguvu ambaye adhabu yake huogopwa, Msifiwa anaye tarajiwa thawabu zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā naqamū min'hum illā an yu'minū bil-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥamīdi
